# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = split(text, "\n")
    for i in eachindex(lines)
        if length(lines[i]) > text_width
            start_pos = findfirst(isequal(' '), lines[i][end-text_width+1:end])
            if start_pos !== nothing
                lines[i] = lines[i][1:(end - text_width + 1)] * "\n" * lines[i][start_pos.start+1:end]
            else
                # 如果找不到空格，则在最后一个单词前插入换行符
                lines[i] = split(lines[i])[1] * "\n" * join(lines[i][2:end], " ")
            end
        end
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# 示例使用
julia> wrap_string("Hello world! This is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line.")
"Hello world! This\nis a very long\nsentence that\nshould be wrapped\nat 10 characters\nper line."
```
